item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Sprout Lunch Menu: | Vores daglige, friske og næringsrige måltidssalat med frit valg mellem vegetabilsk eller animalsk protein. | Our daily fresh and nutritious meal salad with a free choice of either plant-based or animal protein. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu: | Dagens fisk med rødbede spread, kapers og siriusærter med friske urter | Fish of the day with beetroot spread, capers and snow peas with fresh herbs |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu: | Malaysisk laksa nudelsuppe med kylling og sprøde grøntsager, peanuts, friske urter hertil crispy chili olie | Malaysian laksa noodle soup with chicken and crispy vegetables, peanuts, fresh herbs, and crispy chili oil | Vegetar: Malaysisk laksa nudelsuppe med Tofu og sprøde grøntsager, peanuts, friske urter hertil crispy chili olie | Vegetarian: Malaysian laksa noodle soup with Tofu and crispy vegetables, peanuts, fresh herbs and crispy chili oil |

item.title: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu
item.description:
🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu: | Japansk inspireret ramen med saltet gris, risnudler blødkogt æg, syltet daikon, bønnespirer forårsløg, noritang og crispy chili oil. | VEGETAR: Japansk inspireret ramen med seitan, risnudler blødkogt æg, syltet daikon, bønnespirer forårsløg, noritang og crispy chili oil.
Japanese-Inspired Ramen with Salted Pork | Rice noodles, soft-boiled egg, pickled daikon, bean sprouts, spring onions, nori seaweed, and crispy chili oil. | VEGETARIAN: Japanese-inspired ramen with seitan, rice noodles, soft-boiled egg, pickled daikon, bean sprouts, spring onions, nori seaweed, and crispy chili oil.

item.title: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu: | Quesadillas med krydret oksekød, bønner og ost | Sprøde tortillaer fyldt med saftigt, krydret oksekød, cremede bønner og smeltet ost. Serveres med frisk, sprød mexicansk slaw, lækker tomatsalsa og sprøde tortilla chips, der giver retten ekstra crunch og smag. | Vegetarian “Brændende kærlighed” A green and loving twist on the classic dish! Creamy mashed potatoes topped with sautéed mushrooms, tender onions, lightly caramelized apple pieces, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley. | Vegetable Krebinetter with fricassee sauce and potatoes The classic dish – in a green version. Homemade vegetable patties, served with small potatoes and a creamy fricassee sauce filled with seasonal vegetables. | Fruit Salad with Vanilla Yogurt | Vegetarian Tikka Masala Spiced chickpea and vegetable stew in creamy tomato and spice sauce, served with aromatic brown rice pilaf. A taste experience that warms both body and soul. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu: | Tyrkisk Pide af oksekød med çoban salatasi, cremefraiche tilsmagt med fermenteret hvidløgog feta | VEGETAR: Tyrkisk Pide af soyaprotein med çoban salatasi cremefraiche tilsmagt med fermenteret hvidløg og feta | Turkish Beef Pide with çoban salatasi, sour cream flavored with fermented garlic and feta | Vegetarian : Turkish Soy Protein Pide with çoban salatasi sour cream flavored with fermented garlic and feta |
